Um API REST para Santos da Igreja Católi: A REST API about Saints of the Catholic Church
Com simples requisições GET você consegu: With simple GET requests, you get everything you need.
E você não precisa de nenhum token de au: And you don't need any authorization token.
Quotes from each saint and their works.
Todas as informações contidas são fornec: All information is provided by qualified Bishops, Priests, and Deacons.
Segundo o Novo Testamento, o esposo da V: According to the New Testament, he was the husband of the Virgin Mary and the putative father of Jesus. The name Joseph is the English-speaking version of the Hebrew Yosef, through the Latin Iosephus.
